name: Qualisys GmbH
goal: Support the implementation of REACH and CLP in a practical manner, i.e. with a focus on efficiency, by optimising the chemical supply chain with measures such as electronic data exchange, guidelines, agreements an data requirements in special cases etc.
interests: Business and Industry, Consumers, Public Health, Transport
euInitiatives: REACH, CLP, Biocides regulations - including active participation in ENES meeting when useful, or preparatory work under Cefic's leadership
